QuestData.Title: Shrouding Stones
QuestData.Description: Long ago, the shaman of the Shadowmoon clan erected three stones in the woods. There, they performed their sacred rituals, blessing the beasts and the trees.$B$BNow, someone has placed a fel magic upon those stones. This corruption is what shrouds the village of Gul'var.$B$BBefore we can use the captured demon to safely peer into the Shadow Council's village, we must bring down those stones.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy the Central, Northern, and Southern Shrouding Stones.
QuestData.CompletionText: Once the shrouding stones are destroyed, we'll turn our attention to breaking this demon's will.
QuestData.RewardText: Now that the veil has been lifted from the woods, we can make use of the demon.$B$BWe will convince it to turn its eye upon Gul'var and show us what the Shadow Council is planning.
